segments.text: Hey Steve . When's the next time you're going to play golf ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you already have a foursome ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately , we do . Let's plan for something together for Wednesday . We can go right after work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds good . Where do you want to play ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We won't have much time , so let's play somewhere close to work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about Bellevue ? It's pretty close .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much does it cost over there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's pretty good . Let's do it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Aright . I'll get a tee time for Wednesday at about 4
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I'll call you later when I get a tee time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good . I'll see you on Wednesday then .
segments.speaker: S2
